Title.Language: Doxology for the Strong Abba Moses

Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of St. Moses

Text.Language: Pisorp m~marturoc e#y#u#: e~tafjwk e~bol n~kalwc: qen pitwou n~te Sih/t: pe peniwt e#y#u# abba Mwc/.
The first holy martyr, who was well perfected, on the mountain of Shiheet, is our holy father Abba Moses.
الشهيد الأول القديس الذي كمل حسنا في جبل شيهات هو أبونا القديس أنبا موسى.
Afswpi gar n~ouref]: efoi n~ho] oube nidemwn: afo~hi e~ratf hijen ]petra: kata p~tupoc m~pic~tauroc.
He became a fighter, whom the demons fear. He stood upon the rock, as a type of the Cross.
لأنه صار محاربا مخوفا ضد الشياطين ووقف على الصخرة كمثال الصليب.
Hiten tefnis] n~hupomon/: nem piqici n~te nibacanoc: afervorin m~pi,~lom: n~te ]metmarturoc.
Through his great patience, of the travails of his torments, he wore the crown, of martyrdom.
بعظم صبره وتعب العذابات لبس الإكليل الذي للشهادة.
Afhwl e~p~[ici qen pip#n#a#: e~qoun e~nefman~emton: e~tafcebtwtou n~je Po#c#: n~n/eymei m~pefran e#y#u#.
He flew in the spirit to the heights, to the place of rest, which the Lord has prepared, for those who love His holy name.
ذهب بالروح إلي العلو إلي مواضع النياح التي أعدها الرب لمحبي اسمه القدوس.
Afcwjp nan m~pefcwma: nem pefc~p/leon e#y#u#: eyrenjwk e~bol n~q/tf: m~peferv~meui~ ettai/out.
He left for us his holy body, and his holy cave, that we may complete in it, his honored memorial.
وأبقى لنا جسده ومغارته المقدسة لنكمل فيها تذكاره المكرم.
Enws e~bol enjw m~moc: je V] n~abba Mwc/: nem n/e~taujwk e~bol nemaf: a~riounai nem nen'u,/.
Proclaiming and saying, “O God of Abba Moses, and those who were perfected with him, have mercy upon our souls.”
إذ نصرخ قائلين يا اله أنبا موسى والذين كملوا معه اصنع رحمة مع نفوسنا.
Ouoh n~tensasni e~niws: e~tafcebtwtou n~n/e#y#u#: e~tauranaf icjen p~e~neh: eybe toua~gap/ e~qoun e~rof.
That we may win the promises, which He has prepared for the saints, who have pleased Him since the beginning, because of their love for Him.
ونفوز بالمواعيد المعدة للقديسين الذين أرضوه منذ البدء لأجل حبهم فيه.
Twbh m~Po#c# e~h~r/i e~jwn: w~ pao#c# n~iwt abba Mwc/: nem nefs/ri n~c~taurovoroc: n~tef,a nennobi nan e~bol.
Pray to the Lord on our behalf, O my master the father Abba Moses, and his children the cross-bearers, that He may forgive us our sins.
أطلب من الرب عنا ياسيدى ألآب أنبا موسى وأولاده لباس الصليب ليغفر لنا خطايانا.
